Topic.Title: When I try to edit my game it says my game ID is invalid and doesn't open?

Posts.EditableText: Hi, I'm trying to edit my game (published but unlisted) but when I try and click the edit button it says that my game ID is invalid and redirects to the main 'Play' textadventures page rather than letting me edit my game. It's still playable but I really need to fix some bugs and I'm not sure what to do. Any help would be greatly appreciated!
Posts.HTML: Hi, I'm trying to edit my game (published but unlisted) but when I try and click the edit button it says that my game ID is invalid and redirects to the main 'Play' textadventures page rather than letting me edit my game. It's still playable but I really need to fix some bugs and I'm not sure what to do. Any help would be greatly appreciated!
